## findIndex variable

Similar to `Array.findIndex()`<!-- -->, but uses [equiv](./equiv.equiv.md) as default predicate.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findIndex: <T>(src: ArrayLike<T>, x: T, equiv?: import("@thi.ng/api").Fn2<T, T, boolean>) => number
```
